name: Twine Walker
description:
Do you love Twine?

Do you want to experience lovingly crafted but distinctly inferior versions of several of the genre's finest works?

Do you want to experience them in a way that makes reading the text distinctly unpleasant?

If you answered yes to all the above, do I have the game for you!

-----

STEP
on a copious number of words!

STRAIN
your eyes trying to read 3D text from odd angles!

STRUGGLE
with 3D platforming controls!

ALL THAT AND MORE!

-----

And best of all, we promise you the absolute minimum in genre compatibility!

So what are you waiting for? Download this game now, and Walk the Twine!

-----

This game contains coarse language, references to suicide, mild drug use, references to torture, and glamorous violence. Viewer discretion is advised.

-----

Controls
WASD - MovementShift - SprintCtrl - CrouchSpace - JumpRight Click - ZoomEsc - Hold to quit

-----

Produced in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41, with the theme 'Combine Two Incompatible Genres'
